file.title: AMM PART II-1285 - CHAPTER 72-52-00-02 - HP TURBINE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES

page.data: AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL HP TURBINE - MAINTENANCE PRACTICES EFFECTIVITY: ALL 1. General A. This section gives the procedures to replace the HP turbine components. B. The procedures in this section are given in the sequence below. The tasks identified with ( ♦) are part of the Scheduled Maintenance Requirements Document (SMRD). TASK NUMBER DESCRIPTION EFFECTIVITY ALL 72-52-00-960-801-A HP TURBINE WHEELS - REPLACEMENT ALL 72-52-00-960-802-A HP TURBINE SPACER - REPLACEMENT EMB-145 - AMM 1285 General 72-52-00 Page 1 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-52-00-960-801-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 2. HP TURBINE WHEELS - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) To do the replacement and discard procedure, obey the instructions contained in Rolls- Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400 ENGINE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400 ENGINE - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-002-A (1) Remove the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400). J. Replace/Discard High Pressure Turbine Wheels SUBTASK 960-002-A (1) Disassemble HPT rotor. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. (2) Discard the applicable HP turbine wheel. (3) Assemble HPT rotor with a new HP turbine wheels. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls- Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-52-00 Page 2 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-002-A (1) Install the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-801-A/200 72-52-00 Page 3 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.

AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL TASK 72-52-00-960-802-A EFFECTIVITY: ALL 3. HP TURBINE SPACER - REPLACEMENT A. General (1) To do the replacement and discard procedure, obey the instructions given in Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010 . B. References REFERENCE DESIGNATION AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400 ENGINE - REMOVAL AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400 ENGINE - INSTALLATION Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010 - C. Zones and Accesses Not Applicable D. Tools and Equipment Not Applicable E. Auxiliary Items Not Applicable F. Consumable Materials Not Applicable G. Expandable Parts Not Applicable H. Persons Recommended Not Applicable I. Preparation SUBTASK 841-003-A (1) Remove the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-000-801-A/400). J. Replace/Discard High Pressure Turbine Spacer SUBTASK 960-003-A (1) Disassemble HPT rotor. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls-Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. (2) Discard the applicable HP turbine spacer. (3) Assemble HPT rotor with a new HP turbine spacer. Refer to the latest revision of Rolls- Royce Engine Manual CSP 31010. AIRCRAFT MAINTENANCE MANUAL K. Follow-on SUBTASK 842-003-A (1) Install the engine ( AMM TASK 71-00-00-400-801-A/400). EMB-145 - AMM 1285 960-802-A/200 72-52-00 Page 5 of 5 Rev 48 - Oct 30/15 Copyright ÃÂ© by Embraer S.A. All rights reserved - See title page for details.
